text.div:
SupplyRequestReason

The reason why the supply item was requested.

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/supplyrequest-reason defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
patient-care Patient CareThe supply has been requested for use in direct patient care.
ward-stock Ward StockThe supply has been requested for creating or replenishing ward stock.

name: SupplyRequestReason
title: SupplyRequestReason
description: The reason why the supply item was requested.

concept.definition: The supply has been requested for use in direct patient care.
The supply has been requested for creating or replenishing ward stock.
